abstract: BHP Billiton, the global mining giant, said Thursday it had agreed to acquire Canadian potash explorer Athabasca Potash for $323 million in cash, expanding its asset base in the potash-rich Canadian province of Saskatchewan.
snippet: BHP Billiton, the global mining giant, said Thursday it had agreed to acquire Canadian potash explorer Athabasca Potash for $323 million in cash, expanding its asset base in the potash-rich Canadian province of Saskatchewan.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton, the global mining giant, said Thursday it had agreed to acquire Canadian potash explorer Athabasca Potash for 341 million Canadian dollars ($323 million) in cash, expanding its asset base in the potash-rich Canadian province of Saskatchewan.

headline.main: BHP Buys Potash Producer in Canada
